alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 2:33PM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.9 feet by Sunday morning. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 245 AM CDT.
